definition: sentence-final particle that conveys informality, warmth, friendliness or intimacy/may also indicate that one is stating a fact that the other person is not aware of
oh (interjection indicating that one has just learned sth)
oh (interjection indicating doubt or surprise)
to chant
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
I/me/my
to chant/to recite rhythmically/to polish verse

sentences.english: Oh Fiona found out she had some money in her pocket.
sentences.chinese: 哦，霏欧纳兜里带了着些钱。

sentences.english: Oh, and tell therm we want it small enough to fit on a book cover.
sentences.chinese: 哦，告诉他们要小一点，要能够放在书的封面上。

sentences.english: After a few days, so a lot oh, grow out smallpox in India.
sentences.chinese: 过了几天，好了很多哦，痘印淡下去了。

sentences.english: Oh, this is my wife Lena.
sentences.chinese: 哦，对了，这是我的妻子蕾娜。

sentences.english: O for my sake do you with Fortune chide.
sentences.chinese: 哦，请为我把命运的女神诟让。

sentences.english: "I say, " he said, addressing the driver, "so you tell me it's not dangerous here?
sentences.chinese: “我说”他对着马夫说，“你告诉我这不危险哦？

sentences.english: Oh，they look just like live cranes.
sentences.chinese: 哦，这些仙鹤看上去就像真的一样。

sentences.english: Oh, she said with an overly dramatic hit to her forehead.
sentences.chinese: 哦，她极富戏剧性地伸手拍一下额头，说。

sentences.english: B----Oh, Come on, high cal is exactly the thing we need here!
sentences.chinese: 哦，开什么玩笑，高卡路里正是我们需要的。

sentences.english: By the way, I'm in Branford College, which is of long history.
sentences.chinese: 对了，我住在布兰福学院，它可是有着悠久的历史哦。

sentences.english: Tracy: Oh, I've heard of it.
Elder sister, too much, see so that my head faints.
sentences.chinese: 姐姐哦，太多了，看得我头都晕了。

sentences.english: Oh, you could say that an old friend turned up and that you wanted to see her.
sentences.chinese: 哦，你可以说一位老朋友来了，你想跟她见见面。

sentences.english: Oh, the wind beneath my wings.
sentences.chinese: 哦，你就是那风，托举起我的双翼。

sentences.english: Oh, I always thought the Olympics had mixed doubles.
sentences.chinese: 哦，我一直以为奥运会也有混双比赛呢。
